quote: There was nothing else in the entire universe, nothing but the two of them together. Her curves, his angles. Her light, his darkness. Her softness, his exquisitely aching hardness.	Male. Female.
quote_letters: THERE WAS NOTHING ELSE IN THE ENTIRE UNIVERSE NOTHING BUT THE TWO OF THEM TOGETHER HER CURVES HIS ANGLES HER LIGHT HIS DARKNESS HER SOFTNESS HIS EXQUISITELY ACHING HARDNESSMALE FEMALE
